string.value: Muirhat is worried about the evil spirits that have infiltrated Victoria Island as of late. I wonder what I could do to help? I should go talk to Muirhat on the top deck of The Nautilus.

Victoria Island has already been infused with evil spirits. But I refuse to give up like this. I need to eliminate #r100 Dark Stone Golems#k to stop these evil creatures from further spreading their evilness in Victoria Island. \n\n#o 5130102# #r#a21991##k
I've eliminated 100 Dark Stone Golems. I wonder if I've made a difference in Victoria Island?
Thank you for the wonderful job you did last time. Unfortuntely, I don't think that was enough to prevent the evil spirits from reaching further. Can you help me once more?
Thank you. This time, it's #r100 Dark Stone Golems#k. They are much more powerful than the Stone Golems you faced last time. Please take care of yourself.
You must be busy with other endeavors. That's unfortunate. I'll just have to look for other willing warriors.
That was fast. I knew you'd be able to do it. Hopefully your efforts will result in bringing in peace on Victoria Island.
Once you make yourself more powerful, I'll contact you again for more help.
Please defeat 100 Dark Stone Golems. They can be found in the deepest part of Victoria Island.
